评论详情: The lavender color is darker and more muddy looking than pictured in ad. The material does not look like the gauzy appearance like in the ad picture. The pockets are in a awkward position and feels like another reviewer stated it feels like you are wearing this backwards. I bought another color turquoise that the color is much nicer but the same awkward like you are wearing it backwards feel. The pockets need to be repositioned on this for sure. The material should be more linen like and less artificial feeling. Would I buy any more of these? No, they feel too awkward and the fabric too unnatural.

评论概述: Perfect for summer at the pool or maternity wear
评论详情: Throughout my pregnancy I have been trying to purchase stretchy or oversized clothes that I could wear beyond pregnancy. This dress has been so perfect for the summer heat and accommodates my bump! It is so comfortable, and the fabric is decent quality. As a bonus, you get pockets too. It doesn’t wrinkle easy, even after a day at the pool. Overall I give it a 10/10 on value!  I’ll be using this postpartum and as a summer dress or pool cover up. Can’t wait to add more colors to my closet!
